positive_examples: This is an example of pectin.
We observed pectin in this context.
A typical case of pectin would involve these features.
The concept of pectin applies here.
A structural polysaccharide found in plant cell walls that acts as a gelling agent and dietary fiber.
negative_examples: This is an example of starch, not pectin.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Starch, or other types of Carbohydrate

definition: A plant polysaccharide used as a gelling agent in jams and jellies.
